pages.text: $(li)Capuchin monkeys are small creatures with black and cream-colored fur around their head that are located in the depths of the Jungle of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can find four variants:$(li)White Headed Capuchin $(li)Blond Capuchin $(li)Brown Capuchin $(li)Weeper Capuchin$(br2)

$(li)You can heal these creatures feeding them with eggs.$(br)$(li)They can bred feeding them with Maggots.$(br)$(li)You can feed them with bananas to tame them too.$(br)$(li)If you give them Ancient Darts they will gain piercing damage.
$(li)Sometimes they can drop a Banana Peel when they are eating a Banana.
